code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/messages"));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var createMessage=function createMessage(message){var request=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/messages"),message);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var addResponse=function addResponse(id,newResponse){var request=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newResponse);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,createMessage:createMessage,addResponse:addResponse};
